recipe.ingredients: - chicken breasts (boneless, skinless): 4 (6 ounces each) - carrots (peeled and sliced): 4 medium - broccoli florets: 2 cups - zucchini (sliced): 2 medium - garlic (minced): 4 cloves - olive oil: 3 tablespoons - dried rosemary: 1 teaspoon - dried thyme: 1 teaspoon - salt: 1/2 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/4 teaspoon - lemon (juiced): 1
recipe.directions: 1. Preheat Oven: Preheat your oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit. 2. Prepare Vegetables: Spread the sliced carrots, broccoli, and zucchini in a large baking dish. 3. Season Chicken: In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, minced garlic, rosemary, thyme, salt, and black pepper. Rub this mixture over the chicken breasts. 4. Arrange Chicken: Place the seasoned chicken breasts on top of the vegetables in the baking dish. 5. Bake: Place the dish in the oven and bake for about 25-30 minutes, or until the chicken is thoroughly cooked (internal temperature reaches 165 degrees Fahrenheit) and vegetables are tender. 6. Add Lemon: Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the chicken and vegetables before serving.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 15g, Dietary Fiber: 5g, Sodium: 400mg, Saturated Fat: 3g, Total Fat: 14g, Protein: 36g, Added Sugars: 0g, Total Sugars: 5g
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe : Approximately 1396 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Chicken Breasts: 828 calories (207 calories per breast) Carrots: 100 calories for 4 medium Broccoli: 60 calories for 2 cups Zucchini: 66 calories for 2 medium Garlic: 16 calories for 4 cloves Olive Oil: 358 calories for 3 tablespoons Rosemary, Thyme, Salt, Black Pepper: Negligible Lemon: 12 calories per lemon - Serving People: 4
